text: Nuhako jatibandhule ra uham pascataka samuhaharule pani jhutha bhane ra hara um'matale (kaumale) aphna paigambaraharuko barema iccha gare ki tinala'i samatihalun ra uniharule asatyako sahara li'era jhagada gare, taki tinabata satyala'i bigaride'un. Atah uniharula'i maile samatihalem, tasartha mero yatana kasto bhayo
